metadata.title: CVE-2024-6502 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 8.2 prior to 17.1.6 starting from 17.2 prior to 17.2.4, and startingfrom 17.3 prior to 17.3.1, which allows an attacker to create a branch withthe same name as a deleted tag.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
